title: LOL Cant Open Stuck At LOL LOGO
body: i cant open league og legends everytime i open it cant open i only see the LOGO i opend task manager its stuck at 2,790 KB i uninstall it and i will reinstall now. Any help will be nice :)

replies.body:
When your patcher won't launch, it can typically be caused by a number of factors. Our [patching guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) addresses the most common solutions, so I recommend giving them a try.

Let me know if this helped resolve the issue.

Hey sir or dude i did what it say s in de patching guide but itz still the same click this link to see the screen shot    >https://postimg.org/image/78dipakpz/    <   i uninstalled LOL downloaded installer again and its still the same pz can u give any other advice??

In this instance, there may be some other factors outside the norm which would cause this. I recommend grabbing a set of logs using our [Hextech Repair Tool ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)then [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and attaching the log file with your request. One of our tech specialists will be able to dive into those logs and provide you a more detailed solution.
